      • setValuesToPreparedStatement

        public static int setValuesToPreparedStatement(int startIndex,
                                               PreparedStatement preparedStatement,
                                               Iterable values)
                                        throws SQLException

        Binds a set of values to the statement.

        Parameters:
        startIndex - parameter index from where to start the binding.
        preparedStatement - the prepared statement.
        values - The values to bind
        Returns:
        The new start index.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the binding fails.
